doc:
J. Barney Sherry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J._Barney_Sherry 0 J. Barney Sherry (March 4, 1874 – February 22, 1944) was an American actor of the silent film era. He appeared in 215 films between 1905 and 1929. He was born in Germantown, Pennsylvania and died in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania from cardiovascular disease. J._Barney_Sherry ( March_4_,_1874 – February_22_,_1944 ) was an_American_actor of the_silent_film_era . He appeared in 215_films between 1905_and_1929 . He was_born in Germantown , Pennsylvania and died in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania from cardiovascular_disease .
